TopicTitle: Go directly from VAB to Tracking Station, etc

Articles.Content: This has probably been suggested a thousand times before, but since loading screens suck, I'm going to toss in my 2 kents. When you're in space or in another building, why do you need to go to KSC before going to that other building? Why not just have a direct path available and skip a loading screen? Or is there a direct path already and I just haven't found it?
